title.en: A Female Ninja's Camouflage no Jutsu
I Look Too Much Like The Boss And The World Actually Believes It

altTitles.zh: 长的太像BOSS，结果世人真的信了

altTitles.zh-ro: Zhang De Tai Xiang BOSS, Jieguo Shiren Zhen De Xinle
Zhǎng De Tài Xiàng BOSS, Jiéguǒ Shìrén Zhēn De Xìnle

altTitles.en: The Appearance is so BOSS-like, Yet Everyone Believes it

description.en: Moon Lord, Suliang! Tamer of the Divine Lunar Morpho Butterfly, a familiar with abilities to control time and space, yin and yang, I am the invincible youth that stands at the apex of this world! To get such a status upon reincarnation is like getting dealt Pocket Aces… Divine my Arse! The beast in my body is nothing like the Divine Lunar Morpho! It’s clearly the lowest of low level Flash Butterfly!!! Facing millions of fanatical believers, a death match with Emperor Cangyue in three years time, and various sects viewing me as a thorn in their side… This is really an unprecedented beast tamer crisis!
description.zh: 月之王，苏凉！操纵着能回溯时空、逆转阴阳的月神闪蝶，以此站在这个世界的顶点的无敌少年！ 穿越而来就拿到这么NB的身份卡，岂不是天胡开局……个屁咧！ 我体内的宠兽，哪是什么月神闪蝶！！根本只是个只能照明的最最最低阶的闪光蝶！！！ 面对数以百万的狂热信徒、三年后约战的沧月大帝、视自己为眼中钉的各大教派…… 这还真是…… 前所未有的御兽大危机！

altTitles.th: มุกฮยาง ดาร์กเลดี้

altTitles.pt-br: Mook Hyang – As aventuras de Dark

description.de: Der einzigartige Kampfkünstler und stolze Herrscher der Dämonensekte, Mookhyang, landet durch einen Fluch der gegnerischen Blutsekte in einer geheimnisvollen Fantasy-Welt. Doch wenn herauskommt, welch unglaubliche Kontrolle Mookhyang über Qi oder Mana hat, ist es nur eine Frage der Zeit, bis er erneut verflucht wird ... und sich in eine junge Frau verwandelt!? Wird die Macht über chinesische Kampfkunst in dieser Welt der Elfen, Magier und Drachen ausreichen, damit ein Mann (oder eine Frau) wieder nach Hause zurückkehren kann? Oder wird dieser arme Krieger letztendlich eine Niederlage erleiden?
description.en:
As the master of the School of Unholy Arts and as the undefeated Unmasked Demon, MookHyang unfortunately falls to a strange fantasy world by the magic of his enemies (School of Blood Arts). In the new world of elf, sorcerer, knight, and dragon, MookHyang’s adventure of finding a way back to his old world (Murim) unfolds.

description.fr: Mookhyang, pratiquant des arts martiaux et hiérarche de la Secte Démoniaque, se retrouve plongé dans un univers fantastique après avoir été victime d'une malédiction de la part de son ennemi, la Secte du Sang. Mais lorsque les capacités de contrôle du Qi (ou « mana ») de Mookhyang sont révélées au grand jour, ce dernier se retrouve bientôt à nouveau maudit... et transformé en... jeune fille ! Dans cet univers où vivent elfes, mages, chevaliers et dragons, la maîtrise des art martiaux chinois suffira-t-elle à un homme (ou à une « femme » ? ) pour survivre et retrouver le chemin vers un monde ordinaire ? Ou bien cet humble guerrier déclarera-t-il forfait ?
description.ja: 千年に一人の達人「脱魔」の域に達した魔教の教主、墨香。 しかし武林の支配を目論む張仁傑の怪しげな術により異なる世界へ飛ばされてしまう。 言葉も文化も分からない世界で、墨香の孤独な戦いが幕を開ける。
description.ko:
마교의 교주로서 극강의 무공을 자랑하던 묵향은 적들(혈교)에 의해 생전 처음 보는 생소한 이세계(판타지 세계)로 떨어지게 된다. 그곳에서 엘프, 마법사, 기사, 드래곤 등 새로운 존재들과 만나며... 무림 최고수 묵향이 원래 자신의 세상(무림)으로 돌아가기 위해 긴 모험을 떠나게 된다는 스토리.

한국의 무협소설과 판타지 문학을 사랑하는 수많은 독자들이 기다려왔던 초대형 이벤트― 웹툰계를 뒤흔들 다시없을 프로젝트가 시작된다! 
1999년부터 시작된 전설, 누계부수 300만부... 무협소설과 판타지문학을 접목시킨 기념비적인 장르소설인 [묵향]이 드디어 만화화!! 

한국 무협판타지의 한 획을 그었던 전동조 작가의 메가히트 장르소설 [묵향]을 만화화! 만화의 내용은 원작의 2부격인 [다크레이디] 편에서부터 시작한다.

description.ru:
Будучи мастером школы темных искусств и непобедимым незыблемым истым демоном, Мукхян, к несчастью, попадает в странный фэнтезийный мир из-за магии своих врагов (школа искусств крови). В новом мире эльфов, колдунов, рыцарей и драконов, разворачивается приключение Мукхяна по поиску пути назад в его старый мир, Мурим.

description.th: มุกฮยาง เจ้าสำนักปีศาจได้ถูกส่งตัวข้ามพิภพมายังโลกใหม่ที่ภาษา, วัฒนธรรมและทุกๆ อย่างได้แตกต่างจากยุทธจักรของเขาอย่างสิ้นเชิง ซ้ำร้ายยังต้องคำสาปให้กลายร่างเป็นเด็กผู้หญิงแสนบอบบางที่เขารังเกียจ แล้วเขาจะหาทางกลับคืนร่างและหวนกลับไปยังยุทธจักรของเขาได้หรือไม่
description.zh: 魔教教主墨香在经历脱胎换骨之后，修道成仙。 却在即将称霸武林之际遭人谋算，被移送至了精灵、魔法师、骑士、龙等生物共存的异世界里，墨香为了重回原来的世界，开始了冒险之旅！
description.pt-br: MookHyang, o mestre da Escola das Artes Profanas e o invencível Demônio Exposto, é infelizmente enviado a um mundo de fantasia estranho pela magia de seus inimigos da Escola das Artes de Sangue. Em um novo mundo com elfos, feiticeiros, cavaleiros e dragões, a aventura de MookHyang em busca de um meio para voltar ao seu velho mundo (Murim) tem início.
description.zh-hk:
身懷絕世武功的魔教教主墨香，被來自血教的敵人
送往生平從未見過的陌生異域(奇幻世界)。
在那裡，他遇上了精靈、魔法師、騎士、龍族...等
前所未聞的人事物。
為了回到原本的世界(武林)，
武林第一人墨香踏上旅程，一場大冒險就此展開!

喜愛韓國武俠小說與奇幻文學的讀者
引頸期盼的超大型活動!
震撼Webtoon界的絕倫企劃正式啟動!
1999年開始連載的傳說之作、累積銷量高達300萬冊...
結合武俠與奇幻的劃時代小說「墨香」，終於漫畫化!!

為韓國奇幻武俠立下全新里程碑的大師級作家
JEON DongZo精心打造的超高人氣小說「墨香」，
終於漫畫化啦!!

漫畫內容由原著第二部《Dark Lady》開展。

altTitles.vi: Lời tuyên án của Đức Mẹ

description.ar: بعد وفاة ابنها بطريقة مروعة، تكتشف والدتهُ تنمر الآخرين الشديد عليه، فعقدت العزم على معاقبة أولئك المتنمرين الذين أخذوا ابنها الحبيب منها، وبدأت العمل كممرضة في المدرسة
description.en: The Nagare family was a happy home of three people. However, their son Kiritaka was secretly bullied at school. Then, an incident occurs, and the mother Mari's love for her son goes out of control.
description.ne: आमाबुवा र छोरासहित ३ जनाको नागारे परिवारको खुसीको घर थियो। तर, उनीहरुको छोरा किरिताकालाई विद्यालयमा गोप्य रुपमा कुटपिट गरिएको थियो।  त्यसपछि, एउटा घटना घट्छ, र आमा मारियाको छोराप्रतिको माया अनियन्त्रित हुन्छ।
description.vi:
Một gia đình ba người những tưởng đang hạnh phúc, cho đến khi Kiritaka, người con trai duy nhất của Nagare Mari "tự sát" vì "quá đau khổ". Cho rằng bản thân đã vô tình dồn ép con trai yêu quý, Mari toang tìm đến cái chết, nhưng không... cô vô tình phát hiện ra sự thật con trai mình đã liên tục bị bắt nạt suốt một thời gian dài bởi những con quỷ đội lốt người tại trường học.
Và rồi tình thương con da diết của Mari... đã vượt ngoài tầm kiểm soát của trái tim cô.
description.es-la: La familia Nagare era un hogar feliz formado por tres personas. Sin embargo, su hijo Kiritaka sufría acoso escolar extremo en secreto. Entonces, ocurre un incidente que haría que el amor de la madre, Mari, se descontrolara por completo.

altTitles.ja: となりはふつうのニジカ（ちゃん）

altTitles.en: Next to me is the Ordinary Nijika (-chan)

description.en:
Since Aira was a little girl, boys have protected her because of her lovable appearance.

However, she never asked for their protection, or for people to gossip about how she’s so full of herself. Troublesome occurrences like those happen to her because of her appearance, so she decided that once she entered high school, she’d play the “girlish Aira” role so she wouldn’t have to deal with more bothersome situations.

One day, a person named Nijika, came to live in Aira’s house. Nijika’s family had been transferred overseas and they wanted Nijika to stay with an acquainted family they knew.

However, Aira finds out later that Nijika is actually… a guy!? Nijika who was biologically born a male, wears the clothes they want to wear, puts on the makeup they want to put on, and confidently expresses their feelings without a care in the world.

Aira doesn’t know if they are a guy, a girl, or even her friend, but one thing is certain. Aira’s extraordinary everyday life with Nijika has now started!
description.ja: 超絶美少女と突然の同居生活！…と思ったけど!?　見た目で期待されるイメージとのギャップに悩んでいるあいらは自由奔放な虹翔（にじか）と出会ってから自分の気持ちに素直でいたいと思うようになって…？

title.en: Boku wa Kimitachi wo Shihai suru

altTitles.ja: 僕は君たちを支配する

altTitles.zh-hk: 我將要支配你們的一切

description.en:
Seven women, one man, a suspenseful harem story!

During a class reunion, the school became an enclosed dimension without warning. Yelling and screaming brought no response. 26-year old unemployed Haruka Sato has to survive by cooperating with seven of his former classmates. Soon, the extreme conditions began to eat away at their sanity, and Haruka's hidden desires began to take hold.
description.ru:
Семь женщин и один мужчина - захватывающая история о гареме!

Во время встречи выпускников школа неожиданно превратилась в замкнутое пространство. Крики и вопли ни к чему не привели. 26-летнему безработному Харуке Сато приходится выживать, сотрудничая с семью своими бывшими одноклассниками. Вскоре экстремальные условия начали разъедать их рассудок, и скрытые желания Харуки начали овладевать ими.

---

(Source: [mangalib](https://mangalib.me/boku-wa-kimitachi-wo-shihai-suru?section=info))
description.vi:
Bảy nữ, một nam, câu chuyện hậu cung hồi hộp!
Trong một buổi họp lớp, trường học bỗng nhiên bị một bức tường kỳ lạ bao quanh, không ai có thể thoát ra được. Haruka Sato 26 tuổi thất nghiệp phải sống sót bằng cách hợp tác với bảy người bạn học cũ của mình. Cuối cùng, hoàn cảnh khắc nghiệt bắt đầu ăn mòn tâm trí của họ, và dục vọng thầm kín của Haruka đã lộ ra nanh vuốt
description.es-la: ¡Siete mujeres, un hombre, una historia de harén llena de suspenso! Durante una reunión de ex-alumnos, la escuela se convirtió en una dimensión cerrada sin previo aviso. Los gritos y chillidos no trajeron respuesta. Haruka Sato, desempleado de 26 años, tiene que sobrevivir cooperando con siete de sus antiguas compañeras de clase. Pronto, las condiciones extremas comenzaron a devorar su cordura, y los deseos ocultos de Haruka comenzaron a afianzarse.

title.en: If I Don’t Die Soon, I’ll Become The Ruler Of The Demon Realm!

altTitles.zh: 再不死我就统治魔界了

description.en: Humanity’s strongest warrior was killed by demons amidst a battle and gained the power to reincarnate, but somehow did so as a demon. Only by dying he can go back to living as a human, so he committed suicide non-stop. But things turned out to be the opposite of what he expected…

altTitles.ja: 格闘少女伝説遥かなるリング

description.en:
(from [wikipedia.ja](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E9%81%99%E3%81%8B%E3%81%AA%E3%82%8B%E3%83%AA%E3%83%B3%E3%82%B0)):

Yu Takamine was fascinated by the female pro-wrestlers she saw as a child, and overcoming her parents' opposition, she auditioned for and passed the Tokyo Women's Pro Wrestling Association Match to become a pro-wrestler. 

However, this was only the first step to becoming a wrestler. 

This is the story of Yu, an amateur wrestler who is not particularly strong, and her growth as an apprentice, rookie, heel, idol, and senior wrestler as she explores various fighting styles.

Maeda is a new student in the Teiken High School. He stutters when he's nervous and he's rather clumsy. He gets noted immediately because he hits a teacher during the entrance ceremony. Some clubs search to enlist him as they see in him a force they can use to get even with other clubs. But Maeda is a loner and has only one dream: becoming boxing champion. His first objective is to beat the leader of the boxing club. "Rokudenashi" translates as "good for nothing".  
  
The manga focuses more on gang warfare than boxing.
description.es:
Maeda es un estudiante nuevo en el instituto Teiken. Tartamudea cuando está nervioso y es bastante torpe. Se hace notar inmediatamente porque golpea a un profesor durante la ceremonia de ingreso. Algunos clubes buscan alistarlo ya que ven en él una fuerza que pueden utilizar para vengarse de otros clubes. Pero Maeda es un solitario y sólo tiene un sueño: convertirse en campeón de boxeo. Su primer objetivo es vencer al líder del club de boxeo. "Rokudenashi" se traduce como "bueno para nada".

El manga se centra más en la lucha entre pandillas que en el boxeo.
description.vi:
Maeda Taison, chàng thiếu niên tới từ Osaka mang trong mình ước mơ trở thành nhà vô địch boxing thế giới. Xuyên suốt 3 năm học của cậu không chỉ là những trận đánh, những xung đột mà còn có cả những câu chuyện đầy tính nhân văn.
Huyền thoại của dòng manga yankee Nhật Bản, dù đã kết thúc từ năm 1997 nhưng Rokudenashi Blues (RB) vẫn đang là bộ manga yankee bán chạy nhất mọi thời đại. Vì kết thúc đã lâu nên nội dung của nó có phần "outdate", tuy nhiên vẫn rất đáng đọc.
description.es-la:
Maeda es un estudiante nuevo en el instituto Teiken. Tartamudea cuando está nervioso y es bastante torpe. Se hace notar inmediatamente porque golpea a un profesor durante la ceremonia de ingreso. Algunos clubes buscan alistarlo ya que ven en él una fuerza que pueden utilizar para vengarse de otros clubes. Pero Maeda es un solitario y sólo tiene un sueño: convertirse en campeón de boxeo. Su primer objetivo es vencer al líder del club de boxeo. "Rokudenashi" se traduce como "bueno para nada".

El manga se centra más en la lucha entre pandillas que en el boxeo.

altTitles.pt-br: A Bruxa gênia perdeu seu MP

altTitles.vi: Nàng Phù Thủy Thiên Tài Hết Mana Rồi!

description.en: Nayu, the one in a million genius witch who has been the talk of the town, has run out of magic! The price for all the things she has been allowed to do because of her brilliance is coming back to the former genius witch like a boomerang... Then, she meets her past student "Komugi" who loves her very much. This is a boomerang love comedy of karmic retribution by a former genius witch who can't be left alone even though it stings a little, abandoned by her magical powers!
description.ja: 1mmでも図に乗った事がある元天才の君へ1万年に1人の天才魔女“ナユ”の魔力が枯れた！？天才ゆえに許されてきたあれやこれのツケが、今ブーメランのように突き刺さっていく…そんなナユが助けを求めたのは、自分のことが大好きな教え子の小麦くん。だいぶ痛いけどなんだか放って置けない奇妙な2人の共同生活が始まった！
description.pt-br: Nayu, aquela em um milhão de bruxas geniais que tem sido o assunto da cidade, ficou sem magia! O preço por todas as coisas que ela foi autorizada a fazer por causa de seu brilhantismo está voltando para a ex-bruxa genial como um bumerangue... Então, ela lembrou de seu ex-aluno "Komugi", que a ama muito. Esta é uma comédia de amor de retribuição cármica por uma ex-bruxa genial que não pode ser deixada sozinha, mesmo que doa um pouco, abandonada por seus poderes mágicos!

title.en: Imasara desu ga, Osananajimi wo Suki ni Natte Shimaimashita

altTitles.ja: 今さらですが、幼なじみを好きになってしまいました

altTitles.vi: Có chút muộn màng nhưng tôi đã phải lòng người bạn thuở nhỏ của mình

altTitles.ja-ro: Imasara desu ga, Osananajimi o Suki ni Natteshimaimashita

altTitles.es-la: Es algo tarde, pero me he enamorado de mi amigo de la infancia

altTitles.en: It's a Little Late, but I've Fallen in Love with My Childhood Friend

altTitles.pl: Nieco Późno, ale Zakochałam się w Moim Przyjacielu z Dzieciństwa

altTitles.en: It's Quite Late, but I've Fallen in Love with My Childhood Friend

altTitles.ru: Слишком поздно я влюбилась в друга детства

description.en: A manga adaptation of the [novel](https://note.com/saranami/) written by Maruto Fumiaki. The artist for this adaptation is Yom, the mangaka of *Ganbare, Douki-chan*.
description.pl: Mangowa adaptacja powieści napisanej przez Maruto Fumiaki. Twórcą tej adaptacji jest Yom, mangaka z Ganbare, Douki-chan.

description.en: Gumiho Yeon, who despises humans, accidentally avoids an accident with the help of human Dong-i. In essence, a nine-tailed fox is a being that has to repay the favor it receives. Yeon visits Dong-i without skipping a day for Bo-eun, and Dong-i is only burdened with such a kite. The two, who seemed never to be able to get closer, know each other's wounds and shortcomings, fill them in, and develop good feelings... The two are different in their environment, race, and way of loving. Can a nine-tailed fox and human love have a happy ending?
description.ko:
인간을 멸시하는 구미호 연은 우연히 인간인 동이의 도움을 받아 사고를 면하게 된다.

본디 구미호란 은혜를 입으면 갚아야만 하는 존재.
연은 보은을 위해 하루도 거르지 않고 동이를 찾아가고, 동이는 그런 연이 부담스럽기만 하다.

절대 가까워질 수 없을 것 같던 둘은 서로의 상처와 결핍을 알고, 채워주며 좋은 감정을 키워나가는데...

살아온 환경도, 종족도, 사랑하는 방식마저 다른 둘. 구미호와 인간의 사랑은 과연 행복한 결말로 맺어질 수 있을까?

description.en:
An action packed suspense story of a boy who obtains the absolute authority! 
The story centers around a boy named " Hwang Chomin"  who spends his high school days while enduring its unjust violent treatment. Being informed of his isolated brother's passing away, he receives his phone and confronts the truth about his brother. He learns that his brother is the leader of a notorius ring called [Emperor's Division]. Upon learning that he decides to impersonate his brother and take control of the division by passing judgment on it's scums. And so the King's Game that must be never revealed begins!

Jiang Bei accidentally travels to the Starfall Continent and acquires a cultivation system that uses anger points as a source of power. To survive and enhance his strength, Jiang Bei engages in reckless behavior daily to accumulate anger points. His brother Jiang Nan's arrival introduces him to the world of cultivators. However, an unexpected incident reveals the identity of his mother as a witch, prompting Jiang Bei to embark on a journey to rescue his mother trapped in the Demon Realm.

altTitles.ja: ローゼンガーテン・サーガ

description.en: Lynn's village getting attacked by bandits doesn't keep her down in the dumps for long! Picking up a sword housing an extraordinary pervert… I mean hero, Siegfried, she sets off on a journey of many bouts with various degenerat… ahem, heroes!
description.pt-br: Depois que sua vila foi atacada por um bando de ladrões, Lynn se levantou para proteger seus amigos e o mundo com a ajuda de uma Espada Mágica, que contém a alma de um herói...? Uma história de fantasia/ação com uma heroína sem precedentes(?)

description.en: "Tales of Greed" is back with an even deeper story! What if the desires that every human can have become a reality? Will the outcome ultimately lead to happiness or bring about destruction?
description.id: 'Diary of Desire' kini kembali dengan cerita yang lebih deep! Bagaimana jika keinginan yang bisa dimiliki oleh setiap manusia menjadi kenyataan? Apakah akhirnya akan bahagia atau malah membawa kehancuran?
description.ko:
더욱 더 매운맛으로 돌아온 욕망일기의 새로운 에피소드
인간이라면 누구나 가질법한 욕망,
그것이 현실로 이루어진다면?
그 끝은 과연 행복일까 파멸일까..

altTitles.ja: ウルフちゃんは澄ましたい

altTitles.id: Gadis Serigala Mencoba Untuk Berpura pura Tidak Peduli

altTitles.en: Wolf-chan Is Trying to Feign Indifference

description.en:
The cool, lone-wolf girl and her precious, unrequited crush!

(Source: Ganma!, translated)
description.ja: ウルフカットで一匹狼なクール系女子の尊い片想い！
description.pt-br: A loba solitária fria, e seu precioso amor não correspondido!

description.en:
In the year 2080, the world is like it is now, yet different. Government-arranged marriages, elaborate plastic surgery, and medical science are at the forefront of Japanese society.

Sanda Kazushige is a middle-school student who hasn't quite matured, despite being in the thralls of puberty. Put into a life-threatening situation by his classmate Fuyumura, Sanda discovers his uncanny ability to turn into a burly (and more grown) Santa Claus, and is thrown into a world of chaos to save his fellow students in only ways Santa Claus can do, while trying to solve the mysteries of the school he attends and the truth to where his supposedly-dead classmate Ono went.
description.ja: これは少し未来のお話。超少子化が進み、様々な風習が失われた近未来。大黒愛護学園に通う普通の少年、三田は、なぜか同級生の冬村四織に命を狙われていた。突如として振り下ろされる凶刃。それには、行方不明になった冬村の友人と、三田が抱えている「とある呪い」に理由があって…!?

altTitles.en: Tie Me Up, Stare Me Down.

description.en: Sawada is a section manager in the sales promotion section at the head office of a food supermarket. He is caught between his superiors and subordinates, and has a hard time getting things done. One day after working overtime, he is looking for a place to have a drink when he sees a sign that says “Fetish Bar." When he opens the door, he is greeted by a woman in fishnet tights and a bondage outfit⁉ And the queen who ties him up for a trial play is..
description.ja: 食品スーパー本社の販促課で課長を務める沢田。上と下との板挟みになり、苦労が絶えない。残業後のある日、一杯飲もうと店を探していると「フェティッシュバー」と書かれた看板が目に入る。扉を開けると彼を迎えたのは、網タイツにボンデージ姿の女性たち!?　人気ナンバーワンの女王・ナナによる緊縛を体験した沢田は、今まで感じたことのない快楽と解放感を味わい……。

title.en: The Baby Prisoner of the Winter Castle

altTitles.en: Baby Prisoner of the Winter Castle

altTitles.es-la: La bebé prisionera del castillo de invierno

description.en:
On the night the kingdom fell and the entire royal family was being executed, Clarisse, who naturally thought she would also die, heard something unexpected. 

“We cannot execute anyone who has not reached the age of eighteen. Instead, I will kill you the day you turn eighteen.” 

And so, Clarisse is given ten years to live. 
Clarisse then heads North as a “prisoner.” 
And she asks the Grand Duke for only one thing… 

“Um, is it okay if I take this friend with me? It’s my only friend.” 

But what Clarisse holds out is a rock? 

It’s a new life in the North! 
But this life as a “prisoner” keeps on getting better…?
description.tr:
Krallığın düştüğü gece ve bütün kraliyet ailesinin idam edildiği sırada, doğal olarak öleceğini düşünen Clarisse, beklenmedik bir şey duydu.
“18 yaşına ulaşmamış olan kimseyi idam edemeyiz. Bunun yerine, 18 yaşına bastığın gün seni öldüreceğim.”
Ve böylece, Clarisse’e yaşaması için on yıl süre verilir.
Clarisse sonra bir “esir” olarak Kuzey’e doğru yol alır.
Ve Büyük Dük’ten sadece bir şey ister…
“Uhm, bu arkadaşımı yanımda götürebilir miyim? O benim tek dostum.”
Ancak Clarisse’nin uzattığı şey bir taş mı? Kuzey’de yeni bir hayat!
Ancak bu “esir” hayatı daha da iyiye gidiyor gibi mi?

title.en: Kuse Tsuyo Kanojo wa Toko ni Izanau

altTitles.ja: クセ強彼女は床にいざなう
クセ強彼女はとこにいざなう
クセ強彼女は床(とこ)にいざなう

altTitles.ja-ro: Kusetsuyo Kanojo wa Toko ni Izanau

altTitles.en: A Quirky Girl Is Inviting Me to Bed

description.en:
***I'm suddenly living together with the older girl I used to have a crush on!? Even more, I'm starting to suspect that she's a slut!?***

Naoto Kiyoshi is a young man who just entered university after failing his entrance exams one year before. When he was looking for a place to live in so that he could move to Tokyo, he found himself living together with Luna, a relative and older girl who he used to have a crush on.

The Luna he admired in the past was neat, beautiful and mature... and now she apparently became a slut!? Night after night, he hears her seductive and unladylike moans, and it's making Naoto horny. There are also other men she's unreasonably close to besides him. Luna, whose thoughts he couldn't fathom, is leading him around by the nose! Furthermore, other women with lewd quirks aside from Luna have also gathered there!?

This is the start of his exciting new life surrounded by slutty(?) older girls!
description.ja:
昔好きだったお姉さんといきなり同棲!?しかもヤリマ●疑惑が浮上!?

一浪して大学に合格した青年・木吉直人。上京のために住める場所を探していたところ、親戚で憧れの姉・月（ルナ）の家で同棲することに。
昔憧れていた月は垢ぬけて、美しく成長し…そして…ビッチになっていた!?夜な夜なあられもない嬌声を聞き、モンモンとする直人。
他の男性がいる割に距離感もめちゃくちゃ近い。何を考えているか分からない月に翻弄され、さらに月以外の
エッチで癖が強い女の子たちも集まりだし…!?

ビッチ？なお姉さんたちに囲まれる楽しい新生活、開幕ーー。

description.en: "When Ji Xuan broke up with her ex, Song Zhaoli appeared just in time, as if he had foreseen it. Amidst the falling snow, Song Zhaoli leaned against the car with a cigarette in his mouth and a wicked smile: 'Broke up?' Ji Xuan looked up at him with a cold gaze: 'Even if I break up, it won't be your turn.' Later, Ji Xuan married Song Zhaoli. Everyone thought Ji Xuan was climbing the social ladder, but only Song Zhaoli knew that he was the one who had fought through thorns and thistles to become the male lead."

title.en: Beneath the Surviving Princess' Joyful Façade

altTitles.en: Behind the Laughter of the Surviving Princess

altTitles.es-la: Detrás de la sonrisa de la reina superviviente

description.en:
"Very good. I shall give you my beloved sister, whom I cherish dearly."

Eric Chladnie, who led the long war to victory against the Shidate Principality, received the mandate to marry a foolish princess as a reward for his triumph.

After the wedding ceremony, Eric returned to the mansion with the newlywed princess. Amidst the princess's eccentric behaviour, his father attempts to kill her and his mother advices him to not give his heart. Only he, treating her like a child, respects and cherishes her as his wife. However, who is this woman who, in front of the king, impersonates deeds that she has never done and acts piously?

In his entire life, Lee Seop pursued to become a capable heir of the number one firm in Korea, TK Group. But his efforts were in jeopardy when a genius man manages to take control of the core business in the firm. Frustrated with his own incapabilities, he planned to retaliate in a nonsensical way. Meanwhile, Mikyeong, a top elite in the firm was assigned to work with him.

---

From Webtoon:
With her outstanding business acumen, Mingyeong Kang climbed the corporate ranks of TK Group, Korea’s top conglomerate, to become a senior manager in record time. But after 10 years at the company, she’s been assigned to be the secretary of Iseop Tae, the successor to TK Group. The two entered the company at the same time, but ever since he came second place to her at new employee training, Iseop’s never taken kindly to Mingyeong. She’s better than him in every way and trampled all over his ego… so why can’t he stop thinking about her?
description.ko:
1등만 해 온 나에게 첫 2등의 경험을 안겨준 입사동기, 강민경.
내 자존심을 짓밟은 그녀가 나, 태이섭 전무의 비서가 됐다.
그 뛰어난 업무처리 능력으로 나까지 처리해 버리려고?
업무 그만 하시고 여기 좀 봐주시죠, 강민경씨!
아무것도 하기 싫은 태이섭과 어떻게든 해내야 하는 강민경의 대환장 오피스 로맨스!
description.pt-br: Com sua excelente visão de negócios, Mingyeong Kang subiu as fileiras corporativas do Grupo TK , o principal conglomerado da Coreia, para se tornar gerente sênior em tempo recorde. Mas depois de 10 anos na empresa, ela foi designada para ser a secretária de Iseop Tae, o sucessor do  Grupo TK. Os dois entraram na empresa ao mesmo tempo, mas desde que ele ficou em segundo lugar para ela no treinamento de novos funcionários, Iseop nunca foi gentil com Mingyeong. Ela é melhor do que ele em todos os sentidos e pisoteou todo o seu ego… então por que ele não pode parar de pensar nela?

description.en:
A being that appears to be human, but is stronger than them, Shil. These mysterious beings scattered throughout the world, remain dormant unless Simeone bestows them with a name. After that, their only purpose is to protect that person. Julitan, a simple cook in a small fishing village, encounters a Shil and gives her a name that resembles her crimsom eyes. “Please, tell me my name”. She requests. “Kanellian, the contract holder of noble souls, swears to become the servant of Knight Julitan as her master.” However, Julitan soon realizes that his ordinary abilities cannot handle Kanellian’s extraordinary powers. In the end, he embarks on a long journey to find a new contract holder capable of matching her formidable abilities…

---

**Original Novel**
* [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/62069534), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=9860252), [Ridi](https://ridibooks.com/books/5054003184), [Mr. Blue](https://www.mrblue.com/novel/E000108506), [Bookcube](https://www.bookcube.com/novel/detail.asp?serial_num=sf6306), [Onestory](https://onestory.co.kr/detail/H044600040) 

**Original Webtoon**
* [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/62059840) 
* [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%93%9C%EB%9E%98%EA%B3%A4-%EB%A0%88%EC%9D%B4%EB%94%94/3568)

**Official Translation**
* [Japanese](https://jp.piccoma.com/web/product/151715)

Jiho gains psychic powers from a childhood accident! However, she can't control them! Enduring pain for 18 years with this troublesome ability, Jiho discovers that physical contact with the guy next door, Yechan, can temporarily free her from her psychic woes... To engage in legal physical contact, Jiho must seduce Yechan in this spontaneous and hilarious romantic fantasy hero action with a touch of superpower chaos!

Absolute obedience to the word of the boss!
This is what Ha Eun-ho, a fifth-year Korean worker believes wholeheartedly.
'As long as I have a solid career, I don't need a relationship.'
But what's in store for her as a new recruit? What happens when an old flame starts flirting with her again? What will she do?
A sweet office romance comedy!

altTitles.ko: 계모인데, 죽음을 피하는 게 너무 쉽다

altTitles.en: As A Stepmother, It Is Too Easy To Avoid Death
It's So Easy to Avoid Death by Being a Stepmother
She's A Stepmother, But It's Too Easy To Avoid Death
Stepmother, It's So Easy to Avoid Death

altTitles.es-la: Seré La Madrastra En Esta Historia, Pero Evitare Mi Muerte Destinada

description.en:
The oven exploded while I was baking bread, and I faced death along with my abusive father, who had come seeking me. Then I woke up in a novel I was reading. “I’m sorry, Mo..ther. I’m not hurt.”

In the body of the villainous stepmother “Leila”, who abused the male protagonist “Hirua” when he was young, but was eventually executed by Hirua when he returned as the emperor! In order to help Hirua leave the stepmother’s wraith and live happily, I encounter the Marquis “Lacias Huppert”, who played a crucial role in the original, and proposed a contractual marriage. “Can we have a real marriage instead of a contractual one?”

“Oh, can I sleep with Mother too?” Contrary to the plan to leave only the two of them after a year, it seems that both the Marquis and Hirua have unexpectedly started to become attached to me.

title.en: My Wife Is From a Thousand Years Ago

altTitles.zh: 我家老婆来自一千年前

altTitles.zh-ro: Wojia Laopo Laizi Yiqian Nian Qian
Wǒjiā Lǎopó Láizì Yīqiān Nián Qián

altTitles.vi: Vợ Tôi Từ Một Ngàn Năm Trước
Bà Xã Nhà Tôi Đến Từ Ngàn Năm Trước

altTitles.fr: Ma femme vient d'il y a 1000 ans

description.en: Jiang He, a girl from the Tang Dynasty, traveled through a thousand years and appeared in front of Xu Qing. Fate brought together this love that spanned a thousand years. Everything the girl was familiar with has become history. Relatives, friends, and enemies have all been left behind 1,200 years ago. The boy is unreserved and leads the girl to start a new life. Pain, confusion, cheers, and laughter will remain in this new world.

title.en: Mamahaha no Tsurego ga Moto Kanodatta

altTitles.ja: 継母の連れ子が元カノだった

altTitles.en: My Stepmom's Daughter Is My Ex
My Stepmom's Daughter was My EX-Girlfriend

altTitles.pt-br: A Filha da minha Madrasta era minha ex-Namorada.

altTitles.ru: Дочь моей мачехи - моя бывшая девушка

altTitles.es-la: La hija de mi madrastra es mi ex-novia.

description.en:
A certain boy and girl in middle school became lovers, flirted with each other, disagreed on trivial things, became more frequently irritated with each other rather than excited… and ended up breaking up on graduation. And so, the two of them, Irido Mizuto and Ayai Yume, wound up meeting each other in the most unexpected fashion.

"Isn’t it obvious that I’m the elder brother." "Isn’t it obvious that I’m the elder sister."

The children of the partner of their parent’s remarriage was their ex-lover!? The former couple, mindful of their parent’s feelings, decided on a ‘sibling rule’ where the one takes conscious of the other as the opposite sex loses, but— When they encounter each other in the bathroom, commute to and from school together... along with the memories of the past and living under the same roof, just how do they disregard each other!?  

---

- [Official Twitter](https://twitter.com/tsurekano)
- [Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/series/my-stepmom-s-daughter-is-my-ex) - English translation at J-Novel Club.
description.ja: まだお互いに、好き同士。そんな元カップルが――親の再婚できょうだいに!?　第3回カクヨムWeb小説コンテスト大賞受賞の人気ノベルをコミカライズ！ 一つ屋根の下で繰り広げられる、ひたすらに甘くて焦れったい悶絶ラブコメ！
description.ru:
Эта история о парне и девушке, которые влюбились друг в друга ещё в средней школе. Тем не менее, со временем их любовь превратилась во взаимное раздражение, что привело к их расставанию после окончания школы…  
Но кто бы мог подумать, что судьбы Иридо Мизуто и Айя Юмэ пересекутся вновь при самых неожиданных для них обстоятельствах… Теперь они вынуждены жить под одной крышей, изображая для своих родителей сводного брата и сестру.   
Но оставаясь наедине и предаваясь воспоминаниям о прошлом… Смогут ли они сдержаться и не поддаться своему соблазну?!

title.en: Classmate Who Turns Out to Be a Fiancée.

altTitles.ja: 許嫁だと判明したクラスの陰キャさんと仲良くなっていく話

altTitles.ja-ro: IInazuke da to Hanmei Shita Class no Inkya-san to Nakayoku Natteiku Hanashi

altTitles.en: A Story About Getting Along With a Classmate Who Turns Out to Be a Fiancée.

title.en: My Second Life Is a Healing Life?

altTitles.en: The Second Life Is a Healing Life?

altTitles.pt-br: Minha segunda vida é uma vida de cura?
Minha segunda vida é uma vida de curandeiro?

description.en: Eugene Felivia, the beloved youngest son of the noble Felivia family, known for its great warriors, gains a second life thanks to the grace of 'Felin, the Wizard of Creation.' Eugene dreams of becoming a wizard like Felin, who saved him, and using his powers to make the world a better place. However, the dark and harsh realities and his fate still refuse to let him go...
description.pt-br: Eugene Felivia, o querido filho mais novo da nobre família Felivia, conhecida por seus grandes guerreiros, ganha uma segunda vida graças à graça de ‘Felin, o Feiticeiro da Criação’. Eugene sonha em se tornar um bruxo como Felin, que o salvou, e usar seus poderes para tornar o mundo um lugar melhor. No entanto, a realidade sombria e dura e o seu destino ainda se recusam a deixá-lo ir…

description.en:
The Demon King has been defeated, and now the Demon World is running a contest to choose his successor.   
A muscular and high-level human named Helck has joined and says that he wants to destroy all HUMANS. Is he serious?  
Red Vamirio, one of the Four Heavenly Kings of the whole Demon Empire, is monitoring the contest and can't believe this. What's the secret behind Helck and the human world?
description.pt: Helck é o herói que derrotou um dos reis demônio. Quando um rei demônio morre, um novo deve ser declarado. Isso é feito através de um torneio de artes marciais, onde o mais forte se torna o novo governante. Vamiro, um dos Grandes Reis Demônios, descobre que Helck é um dos participantes do torneio e tem ganhado todas as lutas! Qual poderia ser o motivo? Se um humano se torna o próximo rei demônio, o que isso significa para o reino demoníaco?

altTitles.ja: サキュバスとはじめる真剣交際

altTitles.th: จะขอคบกับคุณซัคคิวบัสจริงจังแล้วนะ

description.en: Takeshi is the captain of a club activity that prohibits romance. A devil [succubus] who seduce men appeared under him. How much can he endure in front of a girl who is sexy but far from neat and clean? How far can you go through a pure and uninterrupted love affair?

The literature industry is suffering from the publishing recession. 
While the literary magazine 'Mokuren' was grieving over the present state of affairs, 
a composition intended for their Newcomer's Award was sent to their editing department. 
However, it completely ignored the application rules. It could have been torn to shreds, 
but the work caught the eye of a sole editor. As a result, their world began to change.  
  
Winner of the 2017 Manga Taisho Award and the 2018 Shogakukan Manga Award.

Psych House--a special home set up for those with supernatural powers. One day, Nemuru, a boy with a Psych that allows him to change size, invites Kotone, a girl with a teleportation Psych, to live at Psych House. The mysterious but normal days of those with psychic powers now begins!
description.pt-br: Psych House--uma casa especial para aqueles com poderes sobrenaturais. Certo dia, Nemuru, um garoto com uma Psico que lhe permite alterar tamanhos, convida Kotone, uma garota com Psico de teleporte, para viver na Psych House. Agora começam os dias misteriosos, mas ainda normais, daqueles com poderes psíquicos!

description.en: After leaving a scar on his best friend's face years ago, Tsubaki feels responsible and is determined to grow up big and strong so he can protect Yuu. Yuu is already in high school and Tsubaki is only in elementary, but he is sure that his feelings will get through and Yuu will eventually come to rely on him.
The story of a dog, Ponta, and his walker, Rieko.

altTitles.ja: 炎の闘球女 ドッジ弾子

description.en: A modern version of the legendary manga "Flaming Ball boy Dodge Danpei" a hot blooded dodgeball manga! Danko, who inherited Danpei's soul struggles to create the strongest super dodgeball team in the Reiwa era! Will Danko be able to overcome the common sense of the modern world!? Look forward to all the beautiful girls passionately drawn by Koshita Tatsuhiro.

altTitles.ja: 野球場でいただきます

description.en:
Tsubame Sakamoto, 25 years old and single. She relieves the everyday stress by indulging in food and alcohol in front of baseball games. Trying out different dishes at different stadiums, with adults loudly cheering around her. It might be expensive, but nothing tastes better than beer after a win. Free from the pressure of society, she will enjoy the best baseball stadium food!

---
- [VOMIC](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL0zfSjyskgIWyAhaN76PJDQu88ci4eI7j)
description.ja: 坂本つばめ、25歳独身。彼女の日々の社会へのストレス発散方法は、野球を肴に飯と酒を貪ること！ 球場によって違う多様なご飯。周りには羽目を外した大人たち。値段は高いけど、勝てば何よりも美味いビール。社会の重圧から解放された非日常で食べる、最高の球場飯をご賞味あれ！
description.ko:
사카모토 츠바메, 25세 독신.
그녀가 평소 사회에서 쌓인 스트레스를 푸는 방법은 야구장에서 돈도 칼로리도 신경 쓰지 않고 마음껏 밥과 술을 먹는 것!!
구장에서 만난 야구관전 초보 카메이와 함께 관동지방 구장의 맛있는 음식들을 맛보고 다닌다.
두 여자의 구장 먹방 라이브, 꼭 맛보세요☆

title.en: Kono Subarashii Sekai ni Shukufuku o! Fantastic Days!

altTitles.ja: この素晴らしい世界に祝福を！ ファンタスティックデイズ

altTitles.en: Gifting this Wonderful World with Blessings! Fantastic Days!

altTitles.ru: Да будет благословенен этот прекрасный мир! Фантастические дни!

altTitles.pt-br: Presenteando este Mundo Maravilhoso com Bênçãos! Dias Fantásticos!

description.en: Manga adaptation of the mobile game Konosuba: Fantastic Days
description.pt-br: Adaptação em mangá do jogo para celular KonoSuba: Fantastic Days

description.en:
Hina is a reclusive otaku vampire. She wants to move to a sacred place for otaku life, but a boy who looks exactly like her favorite vampire lives next door!
And this boy seems to have blood that attracts vampires from all over the world...?
A bloody love comedy between an otaku vampire and a slightly tongue-tied handsome man!

Note: Adapted from the author’s oneshot that was released in Hana to Yume 10-11/2022 combined issue.

title.en: The Big Shot Wants to Marry Her Blind Husband

altTitles.en: Da Lao Yao Jia Mang Fu Jun

description.en: An independent and single career woman, Director Song Ge, unexpectedly finds herself in a novel and was about to marry a visually impaired and lame prince. Embracing the idea of an arranged marriage, Director Song is determined to win the affection of her destined husband, who, to her surprise, turns out to be a kind-hearted spouse with hidden intentions of his own.

Stowing himself away on a slave ship, Julian sets sail for the great continent with a hundred slaves, all yearning for freedom, until...?! Embark on a groundbreaking journey through this action-packed dark fantasy saga!!
An unofficial compilation of oneshots / 4-komas by Cacomistle (カコミスル) in their twitter profile.

title.en: Blue Archive - Problem Solver 68 Business Diary

altTitles.ja: ブルーアーカイブ 便利屋68業務日誌

altTitles.vi: Blue Archive: Nhật kí nghiệp vụ của Handyman 68

description.en: From the smash hit smartphone game "Blue Archive" comes the debut of Problem Solver 68 as our protagonist in this spin-off comic!! Please enjoy the comedic story of our four Problem Solvers in Kivotos - The Academic City!
description.ja: 大人気スマホゲーム『ブルーアーカイブ』から、「便利屋68」を主役としたスピンオフコミックが登場!! 学園都市キヴォトスを舞台に便利屋の4人が巻き起こすドタバタ劇をお楽しみください！
description.vi: Từ trò chơi dành cho smartphone đang nổi tiếng hiện nay "Blue Archive" chào đón sự xuất hiện dưới tư cách nhân vật chính của câu lạc bộ "Handyman 68 (Công ty Dịch vụ giúp việc số 68)" trong bộ manga ngoại truyện này!! Hãy cùng thưởng thức câu chuyện hài hước của bốn cô gái chạy vặt ở Thành phố Học viện Kivotos nào!

altTitles.ja: ふだつきのキョーコちゃん

description.en:
Fudatsuki Kenji is known in his school for two things: for being a delinquent and a siscon. He constantly follows his little sister Kyoko around, fixing her giant ribbon, and chasing off any boys who might be interested in her.   
However, the truth is much stranger than what people believe: he doesn't actually have a crush on his sister. In fact, he likes Hibino, the only girl in his class who isn't afraid of him.
description.ru:
Фудацуки Кэндзи уже давно в школе считают хулиганом и сестролюбом. Причиной тому стало то, что он круглосуточно следит за своей сестрой Кёко, её гигантской лентой в волосах и отпугивает парней, которые заинтересованы в девушке. А ещё Кэндзи влюблен в Хибино-сан, единственную девушку, которая его не боится.   
Истина же в том, что его сестра буквально монстр. Она цзянши, то есть вампир — поэтому она гораздо сильнее человека и ей нужно пить кровь Кэндзи. Кёко носит ленту в волосах, которая сдерживает её аппетит и сильно влияет на личность своей хозяйки.  
Удастся ли Кэндзи сдержать в секрете силы своей сестры и получится ли что-нибудь с девушкой его мечты, Хибино-сан?
description.pt-br: Fudatsuki Kenji é conhecido na escola por duas coisas: por ser um delinquente e por ter um complexo de irmã. Ele sempre está grudado em sua irmã, Kyoko para cuidar dela e fazer de tudo que seu laço não se desfaça. O que acabou gerando uma fofoca em toda a escola que tem uma tara pela própria irmã.O que é uma grande mentira, ele não tem tara nenhuma pela irmã, mas tem um motivo para se protetor e principalmente com o laço dela, pois se o laço for desfeito algo de ruim pode acontecer. o que seria?

description.en: Hitomi stumbles upon an egg in the forest, and from it hatches Tokage-chan, a lizard girl who just wants to be recognized as a kaijuu.
description.pt-br: Hitomi tropeça em um ovo na floresta, e dele nasce Tokage-chan, uma garota lagarto que só quer ser reconhecida como uma kaijuu.

description.en: A huge incident happens to Arika, the center of a hugely popular idol group. Is the culprit a fan? Or could it be... The light and dark sides of the glamorous idol industry are now exposed!
description.ja: 人気急上昇中のアイドルグループのセンター・アリカの身に起きた大事件。犯人はファンか、それとも‥‥。華々しいアイドル業界の光と闇が今暴かれる！
description.vi:
Mamiya Arika, nữ hát chính của nhóm nhạc thần tượng "Lyrical Trick" bỗng mất tích một cách bí ẩn. Và đầu mối duy nhất về dấu vết của cô chỉ đơn giản là một đoạn video camera an ninh.
Liệu đây có đơn giản chỉ là hành vi của một fan hâm mộ quá khích, một idol otaku hay không...!?

description.en:
Three minutes with hot water.

Eating cup noodles with her senpai Mugi is the most delicious thing in the world! Yuasa Shio is a university student who does her research both day and night, and Yakushiji Tsumugi is a graduate student who is her mentor. Today, they continue to push forward with their university life and conduct their research to the best of their abilities, and then, late at night in the laboratory after their research is done for the day, they reward themselves with noodles ー cup noodles, that is. 

This is a story of two science students' adolescence, research, love, and cup noodles.

Cup Noodle, Maruchan Akai Kitsune Green Tanuki, Peyoung... Dazzling cup noodles appear with real names! The cup noodles appearing in this work are used with the permission of the rights holders.
description.ja:
お湯を入れて3分。
むぎ先輩と食べるカップ麺が何より美味しい！
日夜研究を続ける大学生の湯浅汐と、その教育担当である大学院生の薬師寺つむぎ。
二人は今日も大学生活、そして研究に精一杯邁進して、そして深夜の研究室。
ご褒美ご飯のカップ麺にありつくのだった。理系女子大生の青春、研究と恋とカップ麺のお話。

カップヌードル、マルちゃん赤いきつね緑のたぬき、ペヤング…めくるめくるカップ麺が実名で登場！
※本作品に登場するカップ麺は権利元に確認、許諾をいただいて使用しています。
